column5: Heading up to Lac Seul the week of the 4th of July, most likely we'll be on the NW part of the lake. Any reports or suggestions for walleye? Thanks.

A group of us were up on Lac Seul near the Chamberlain Narrows a couple weeks ago. Did extremely well on walleye's. Caught all the Northern we wanted to while fishing for wallies. Our best bet was a jig and either minnow or twister tail in bright colors. The water is high but the fishing is great. Not sure where in the NW portion you are going, but should be good. Probably us a different tactic in July, maybe leeches and crawler rigs.eyesnatcher
